title: Bad Timing
itunes:title: Bad Timing
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners beleive that the relationship is over if their partener says no to the proposal after Angela told a story about a proposal she declined in a past relationship. Also, we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners would support their partner project even if it is trash after MGK did not show support to his girlfriends movie. Moreover, Charalamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a Floridian man that was sentenced for 2 years for not disclosing HIV status to two women.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners beleive that the relationship is over if their partener says no to the proposal after Angela told a story about a proposal she declined in a past relationship. Also, we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners would support their partner project even if it is trash after MGK did not show support to his girlfriends movie. Moreover, Charalamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a Floridian man that was sentenced for 2 years for not disclosing HIV status to two women.
